content:
There are many online communities and websites that feature jazz fusion music. Here are a few that I recommend checking out:

1. All About Jazz - This website has a section dedicated to jazz fusion, featuring news, reviews, and articles about the genre. 2. Jazziz - Jazziz is a magazine and website that covers many different styles of jazz, including fusion. They have articles, reviews, and curated playlists that feature new and established artists. 3. r/JazzFusion - This subreddit is dedicated to jazz fusion and is a great place to discover new music and join discussions with other jazz fusion fans. 4. Bandcamp - Bandcamp is a music platform that supports independent artists, including many jazz fusion musicians. You can browse by genre or search for specific artists to discover new music. 5. Spotify - Spotify has a jazz fusion genre page that features playlists, albums, and artists that blend jazz with other genres. You can also use their Discover Weekly and Release Radar features to discover new jazz fusion music based on your listening history. I hope this helps you find new jazz fusion music to explore and enjoy!
